Author: George Orwell
Description: Dystopian society under constant surveillance and control.

Author: Karl Marx
Description: Analysis of capitalism's structure and dynamics.
Name: Capital Volume I

Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Description: Explores humanity's history, evolution, and societal development
Name: Sapiens

Author: Mark Granovetter
Description: Weak social connections are crucial for opportunity.
Name: The Strength of Weak Ties

Author: Alan Turing
Description: Groundbreaking exploration of artificial intelligence's potential.
Name: Can Machines Think?

Author: John von Neumann and Oskar Morgenstern
Description: Foundation of game theory in economic behavior.
Name: Theory of Games

Author: Quentin Tarantino
Description: Nonlinear storytelling revolutionizing dialogue-driven modern cinema.
Name: Pulp Fiction

Author: Stanley Kubrick
Description: Humanity's evolution and artificial intelligence's existential impact.
Name: 2001: A Space Odyssey

Author: Sergei Eisenstein
Description: Revolutionary propaganda with groundbreaking cinematic editing techniques.
Name: Battleship Potemkin
